SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.sun.voip.client.connector
Interface CallControl

public interface CallControl

The ability to control a single call within a conferece. Note that a CallControl can only be used once. Calling placeCall() more than once will raise an exception.

Method Detail

placeCall

void placeCall(CallParticipant participant)
               throws IOException
Place a call to the specified call participant. This method may only be called once per call control. Calling it multiple times will cause an IOException to be thrown.

Parameters:
participant - the participant
Throws:
IOException

getCallId

String getCallId()
Get the id of this call. The call id is generated by the Bridge, and cannot be changed.

Returns:
the call id

getConferenceId

String getConferenceId()
Get the conferenceId of the conference this call is currently in. This values may be null if the call is not currently in a conference.

Returns:
the conference id

setVolumeFactor

void setVolumeFactor(float volumeFactor)
                     throws IOException
Set the volume factor for a call. The volumeFactor is normally 1.0. Setting the factor to less than 1.0 lowers the volume, greater than 1.0 increases the volume.

Parameters:
volumeFactor - float used to multiply the voice data thereby increasing or decreasing the volume level.
Throws:
IOException

setStereoVolumes

void setStereoVolumes(float leftLeft,
                      float leftRight,
                      float rightLeft,
                      float rightRight)
                      throws IOException
Set the stereo volumes for a call.All values are from 0.0 (mute) to 1.0 (normal) and higher to increase volume. Normally volumes are [1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0]. These volumes are shared by all callers.

Parameters:
leftLeft - the volume from the left input channel to the left output channel
leftRight - the volume from the left input channel to the right output channel
rightLeft - the volume from the right input channel to the left output channel
rightRight - the volume from the right input channel to the right output channel
Throws:
IOException

setPrivateVolumes

void setPrivateVolumes(String targetCallId,
                       float leftLeft,
                       float leftRight,
                       float rightLeft,
                       float rightRight)
                       throws IOException
Set the stereo volumes for a call.All values are from 0.0 (mute) to 1.0 (normal) and higher to increase volume. Normally volumes are [1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0]. These volumes are private to this call.

Parameters:
targetCallId - the call id of the call to change volumes for
leftLeft - the volume from the left input channel to the left output channel
leftRight - the volume from the left input channel to the right output channel
rightLeft - the volume from the right input channel to the left output channel
rightRight - the volume from the right input channel to the right output channel
Throws:
IOException

playTreatment

void playTreatment(String treatment)
                   throws IOException
Play an audio file to a particular call.

Parameters:
treatment - String identifying path of treatment file.
Throws:
IOException

stopAllTreatments

void stopAllTreatments()
                       throws IOException
Stop all audio treatments to this call.

Throws:
IOException

setWhisperEnabled

void setWhisperEnabled(boolean enabled)
                       throws IOException
Enable or disable whispering on this call

Parameters:
enabled - if true, this call can be added to whisper groups. If false it can't
Throws:
IOException

setWhisperMute

void setWhisperMute(boolean isMuted)
                    throws IOException
Mute or unmute this call in whisper groups.

Parameters:
isMuted - boolean indicating whether to mute or not.
Throws:
IOException

createWhisperGroup

void createWhisperGroup(String whisperGroupId,
                        boolean trans,
                        boolean locked,
                        float conferenceVolumeLevel)
                        throws IOException
Create a whisper group This needs to be here for for synchronization for outgoing calls so that the same socket to create the whisper group is used to place the call.

Parameters:
whisperGroupId - String whisper group id
trans - if true, create a transient group that goes away when everyone leaves
locked - if true, create a locked group where people cannot stop whispering
conferenceVolumeLevel - float conference volume level in whiser group
Throws:
IOException

destroyWhisperGroup

void destroyWhisperGroup(String whisperGroupId)
                         throws IOException
Destroy a whisper group

Parameters:
whisperGroupId - String whisper group id
Throws:
IOException

whisperGroupId - String whisper group id
Throws:
IOException

isWhisperEnabled

boolean isWhisperEnabled()
Return whether or not whispering is enabled on this call control

Returns:
true if whispering is enabled, or false if not

getWhisperGroups

String[] getWhisperGroups()
Get the set of whisper groups this call control is a member of

Returns:
the whisper groups this call is a member of

startWhispering

void startWhispering(String whisperGroup)
                     throws IOException
Start whispering in the given whisper group. Note this will stop whispering in any other group the user is currently whispering in.

Parameters:
whisperGroup - the whisper group to start whispering in
Throws:
IOException

getWhisperingGroup

String getWhisperingGroup()
Determine the current whisper group this user is whispering in

Returns:
the whisper group the user is actively whispering in, or null if the user is not whispering

                    throws IOException
